Name: 都市媚影-CityFascination
About the game: This is a role-playing single-player game with the background of parallel world. Players in the game as a recent college graduate, after becoming an ordinary office worker After becoming an ordinary working person, whether you spend your life in a mediocre way or go out with your lover to have a wonderful life. What you become ultimately depends on yourself. Game content Includes a pixelated game plot flow Turn-based character combat Polished and optimized storyline: The plot is described in multiple points only, Full storyline with 6 main characters and various events with various other characters Each female character's story is optimized for differentiation and non-overlap The story of the player and the main character will be staggered in the flow Get to know your soulmate The AI assistant that accompanies you Get out of your wonderful life
Developers: 重瞳鸢工作室[Heavy Pupil Kite Studio]
Publishers: 赛里斯游戏工作室 [Sinae  Game Studio]
